Title: CR_OrchardHelpers
Description:
Devexpress CodeRush plugin. Helps develop modules/themes for Orchard CMS faster and safer.

It can automatically create ContentPart class from ContentPartRecord class, and provide intellassist for stylesheets included in Views.

There are features I'm planning to add when I have more time to work on this plugin.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Devexpress CodeRush plugin. Helps develop modules/themes for Orchard CMS faster and safer.

It can automatically create ContentPart class from ContentPartRecord class, and provide intellassist for stylesheets included in Views.

There are features I'm planning to add when I have more time to work on this plugin.

For more DXCore plugins you can visit http://code.google.com/p/dxcorecommunityplugins.
For plugin development, a really helpful site is http://www.skorkin.com/ from Alex Skorkin.

About Orchard CMS, what can I say... The amazing cms is at http://orchardproject.net/
